Package com.analyzer.sniffer

Class HashtagSniffer

java.lang.Object
com.analyzer.sniffer.Sniffer
com.analyzer.sniffer.HashtagSniffer
public class HashtagSniffer
extends Sniffer
Represents a "hashtag" Sniffer. Searches for the most used hashtags in a user's most popular posts'.
Since:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • findTrend

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> findTrend​(int numOfResultsToFind) throws java.io.IOException
      Returns a list of Hashtag trend results according to users top posts. This implementation specific method analyzes the top user posts. It then will determine useful information for the user to know and returns a list of Hashtag Strings that appears most often as a result for future output.
      Specified by:
      findTrend in class Sniffer
      Parameters:
      numOfResultsToFind - the maximum number of results to find
      Returns:
      the list of String results
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      See Also:
      List

    • getHashtagList

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getHashtagList()
      Returns a list of String Hashtags from all selected top posts and returns a list of all Hashtags within supplement posts as a input for getHashtagTrend().
      Returns:
      the list of all the String Hashtags from supplement posts as results
      See Also:
      List

    • getHashtagTrend

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getHashtagTrend​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> listOfHashtags)
      Returns a list of Hashtags that appears most often from supplement posts
      Returns:
      the list of most popular Hashtags from supplement posts as results
      See Also:
      List
